description: Their new alpinist low socks are the perfect companions for summer in the mountains. Why? Simple: fine merino wool reduces unpleasant foot odors, while synthetic fibers extend durability -- and the alpinist low will also impress with its fit: these low-cut socks are particularly ideal for hot temperatures and are comfortable to wear in lightweight approach shoes or climbing boots.
name: Ortovox Alpinist Low Socks - Mens
